content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Woolf makes to convey her message about the lasting significance of these moments from her past.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Woolf makes to convey her message about the lasting significance of these moments from her past.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
